RhinoNetwork¶

class brg_rhino.datastructures.network.RhinoNetwork(**kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: brg.datastructures.network.network.Network

This class extends the basic network datastructure with Rhino-specific functionality.

Class attributes

Class methods

Descriptors

layer¶

str : The layer of the network.

Any value of appropriate type assigned to this property will be stored in the instance’s attribute dict.

Magic methods
